channel.title: Portals for teleportation?
channel.description: I'm currently working on my home area, and I want to add portals to go to places like KBD or places in the wild/world. Anyone know how I could go about doing this? I'm pretty new to RSC servers, so please be patient. I'm using EasyRSC.

item.title: Portals for teleportation?
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Cozmo131:

I’m currently working on my home area, and I want to add portals to go to places like KBD or places in the wild/world. Anyone know how I could go about doing this? I’m pretty new to RSC servers, so please be patient. I’m using EasyRSC.

Ive made 2 tutorials for this, how to add the portals, make use of them, ect. just look up topics that i’ve made.

Read full topic

item.title: Portals for teleportation?
item.dc:creator: @xx_c1ph3r_xx xx c1ph3r xx
item.description:
@xx_c1ph3r_xx wrote:

add a new object where you want it in GameObjectLoc.xml and re-compress it
edit ObjectAction.java and add an action for the object, just look at the others and learn if you dont know

Read full topic
